member.name: MFSampleAllocatorUsage
member.summary: Specifies the allocator usage of components that implement the interface.

member.name: MFSampleAllocatorUsage.MFSampleAllocatorUsage_UsesProvidedAllocator
member.summary: The output stream will use the camera pipeline's sample allocator to allocate new media samples. If the output stream is producing samples in CPU memory, it is recommended that it use this mode to ensure consistent performance when used in a cross-container scenario.

member.name: MFSampleAllocatorUsage.MFSampleAllocatorUsage_UsesCustomAllocator
member.summary: The output stream will be use a custom allocator for its output samples. It will not use the sample allocator provided by the camera pipeline.

member.name: MFSampleAllocatorUsage.MFSampleAllocatorUsage_DoesNotAllocate
member.summary: The output stream will not allocate new samples for its output samples. It will not be provided a sample allocator by the camera pipeline.
